ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ لَقَدْ عَلِمْتَ مَا لَنَا فِى بَنَاتِكَ مِنْ حَقٍّ وَإِنَّكَ لَتَعْلَمُ مَا نُرِيدُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'You know we have no claim on your daughters. You know very well what it is we want.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They said: "You know we have no need for your daughters, and know well what we want."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They said: 'Surely you already know that we have nothing to do with your daughters. You also know well what we want.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They said, "You certainly know that we have no right to your daughters and you know what we want".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “You know that we have no right to the daughters of your tribe; and you obviously know what we desire.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "Surely, you know that we have no need of your daughters, and indeed you know well what we want!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: Certainly you know that we have no claim on your daughters, and most surely you know what we desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'Thou knowest we have no right to thy daughters, and thou well knowest what we desire.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: Well thou knowest that we have no right to thy daughters, and well thou knowest what we want.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They replied, "You know we have no need of your daughters. You know very well what we are seeking."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: assuredly thou knowest that we have no right to thy daughters, and verily thou knowest that which we would have.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘You certainly know that we have no interest in your daughters, and indeed you know what we want.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "Well dost thou know we have no need of thy daughters: indeed thou knowest quite well what we want!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "Surely you know that we have neither any desire nor in need of your daughters, and indeed you know well what we want!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They replied: 'You know we have no right for your daughters. You know very well what we desire'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “You know well that we have no right to your daughters, and you know well what we want.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "You have already known that we have not concerning your daughters any claim, and indeed, you know what we want."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:79] They said, ‘You know full well that we have no right to, no need of, your daughters, and you know well what we desire’, in the way of sexual intercourse with men.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: Well thou knowest) Lot (that we have no right to your daughters) that we have no need for your daughters, (and well thou knowest what we want) they mean their evil practice.
